titleStmt.title: A proclamation, against the owning of the late King James, and commanding publick prayers to be made for King William and Queen Mary. Edinburgh April 13. 1689.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,,

notesStmt.note: Scottish arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Extracted forth of the record of the meeting of the Estates, by me, Ro. McKenzie, Cls.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
